specialAbilities.name: Fey Ancestry
specialAbilities.description: The drider has advantage on saving throws against being charmed, and magic can't put the drider to sleep.

specialAbilities.name: Innate Spellcasting
specialAbilities.description: The drider's innate spellcasting ability is Wisdom (spell save DC 13). The drider can innately cast the following spells, requiring no material components:

specialAbilities.name: Spider Climb
specialAbilities.description: The drider can climb difficult surfaces, including upside down on ceilings, without needing to make an ability check.

specialAbilities.name: Sunlight Sensitivity
specialAbilities.description: While in sunlight, the drider has disadvantage on attack rolls, as well as on Wisdom (Perception) checks that rely on sight.

specialAbilities.name: Web Walker
specialAbilities.description: The drider ignores movement restrictions caused by webbing.

actions.name: Multiattack
actions.description: The drider makes three attacks, either with its longsword or its longbow. It can replace one of those attacks with a bite attack.

actions.name: Bite
actions.description: Melee Weapon Attack: +6 to hit, reach 5 ft., one creature. Hit: 2 (1d4) piercing damage plus 9 (2d8) poison damage.

actions.name: Longsword
actions.description: Melee Weapon Attack: +6 to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. Hit: 7 (1d8 + 3) slashing damage, or 8 (1d10 + 3) slashing damage if used with two hands.

actions.name: Longbow
actions.description: Ranged Weapon Attack: +6 to hit, range 150/600 ft., one target. Hit: 7 (1d8 + 3) piercing damage plus 4 (1d8) poison damage.
